mapper.select: SELECT *, i.imgname, i.imgpath, i.imgext from goods g inner join imgs i on g.goodsno = i.goodsno WHERE g.gcode IN (SELECT odgcode from orderdetail WHERE orderno IN (SELECT orderno from orders WHERE memno=#{memno})) and not g.goodsno in(SELECT b.goodsno FROM bbs b WHERE bbstype="C" and memno=#{memno} and g.goodsno in (SELECT g.goodsno from goods WHERE g.gcode IN (SELECT odgcode from orderdetail WHERE orderno IN (SELECT orderno from orders WHERE memno=#{memno}))));

SELECT *, i.imgname, i.imgpath, i.imgext from goods g inner join heart h on g.goodsno=h.goodsno inner join imgs i on g.goodsno=i.goodsno WHERE g.goodsno in (SELECT h.goodsno from heart WHERE h.memno=#{memno})
SELECT * from goods g inner join heart h on g.goodsno=h.goodsno inner join goodsdetail d on g.goodsno=d.goodsno where g.goodsno in (SELECT h.goodsno from heart WHERE h.memno=#{memno});
